Detailed Description

USB MUSB functional layer Auxiliary header file.

Path: \(CSLPATH)\ inc

Define Documentation

#define HOST_PACKET_DESCR_TYPE   (0x10)

Descriptor Type of the Host Packet, value is 16 (Bit 31-27)

Referenced by USB_confDmaRx(), and USB_confDmaTx().

#define PACKET_TYPE_FOR_USB   (5u)

Value to indicate the type of packet as USB, for the Host Descriptor Packet

Referenced by USB_confDmaRx(), and USB_confDmaTx().
